data.title: Support for the monarchy Britain 2023, by age
data.meta_description: Although the British monarchy is supported by a plurality of people across most age groups in Great Britain, it is among over 65 year-old's where the level is support is highest at 80 percent.
data.text:
Support for the British monarchy 2023, by age group

Published by D. Clark,

Do you think Britain should continue to have a monarchy in the future, or should it be replaced with an elected head of state? (August 2023)

table column chart

CharacteristicSupport the MonarchySupport for an elected head of stateDon't know18-2437%40%24%25-4956%30%14%50-6467%24%8%65+80%15%4%Overall62%26%11%
